title: Narendra Modi was not declared as 'the World’s Best Prime Minister' by UNESCO
subtitle: UNESCO’s official website has a document mentioning that the news about UNESCO declaring Narendra Modi as the Best Prime Minister in the World is a rumor.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A Facebook post is being shared by many people claiming that our PM Narendra Modi was declared by the UNESCO as the Best Prime Minister in the world. Let’s try to analyze the claim made in the post.

Claim: Narendra Modi is declared as the Best Prime Minister in the World by UNESCO Fact: UNESCO’s official website has a document mentioning that the news about UNESCO declaring Narendra Modi as the Best Prime Minister in the World is a rumor. Hence the claim is FALSE.

When one visits the official UNESCO website, a document was found regarding various rumors and fake news spread across the world in the name of UNESCO. In that document, it can be found that the news regarding the declaration of PM Narendra Modi as the best Prime Minister in the world is one of the favorite rumors.

This misinformation about PM Modi is not new. The same news was viral 3 years ago and now as the elections are in progress, it is being re-circulated again.

Hence, it can be concluded that Narendra Modi was not declared as ‘the World’s Best Prime Minister’ by UNESCO.
